name: Ghost Beach
description:
A small bitsy/bipsi game about chatting with ghosts on vacation. for the bitsy jam #66 

its not much, i only had a couple jokes in mind for it and wasnt able to think of any more lol. so more just one dumb joke inspired by a hades thing than a game. just wanted to create something to get back into working on stuff lol

there is no end, its just afew interactions and thats it. might add to it in the future. make it into something more

Made with bipsi.
